scripts.build: npm run prod && npm run i18n && npm run export
scripts.lint: npm run lint:styles && npm run lint:scripts && npm run lint:php
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:textdomain && npm run i18n:pot
scripts.@comment r: Update changelog and create a new release.
scripts.r:M: git add . && git commit -m 'updated version' && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.r:m: git add . && git commit -m 'updated version' && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.r:p: git add . && git commit -m 'updated version' && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.@comment v: Update changelog and version but DO NOT create a new release.
scripts.v:M: git add . && git commit -m 'updated version' && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin
scripts.v:m: git add . && git commit -m 'updated version' && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin
scripts.v:p: git add . && git commit -m 'updated version' && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin
